chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface
lalcii: lastApplied_le_commitIndex_interface
miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface
lci: leader_completeness_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
taifoli: terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
glci: ghost_log_correct_interface
lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface
glemi: ghost_log_entries_match_interface
tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity net

Premises:
maxIndex_sanity = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => maxIndex_lastApplied net /\ maxIndex_commitIndex net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments maxIndex_sanity {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Build_max_index_sanity_interface : (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity net) -> max_index_sanity_interface
Record match_index_all_entries_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_match_index_all_entries_interface { match_index_all_entries_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> match_index_all_entries net } Arguments match_index_all_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_match_index_all_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record max_index_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_max_index_sanity_interface { max_index_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity net } Arguments max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_max_index_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
maxIndex_sanity_lift : forall net : network, maxIndex_sanity (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) -> lifted_maxIndex_sanity net
Build_match_index_all_entries_interface : (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> match_index_all_entries net) -> match_index_all_entries_interface
maxIndex_sanity_lower : forall net : ghost_log_network, lifted_maxIndex_sanity net -> maxIndex_sanity (deghost (mgv_deghost net))
lower_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost net)) -> forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
msg_lower_prop_all_the_way : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost (mgv_deghost net))) -> forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
lift_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost net)
Record terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface { terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net; terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net } Arguments terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
msg_lift_prop_all_the_way : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost (mgv_deghost net))
terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net
terms_and_indices_from_one_log_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net
current_term_gt_zero_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> current_term_gt_zero net
no_entries_past_current_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> no_entries_past_current_term net
lastApplied_le_commitIndex_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> lastApplied_le_commitIndex net
logs_sorted_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net
log_matching_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_matching net
prevLog_leader_sublog_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> prevLog_leader_sublog net
leader_sublog_invariant_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leader_sublog_invariant net
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable (deghost net) } Arguments raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
lift_max_index_sanity : forall (net : ghost_log_network) (h : Net.name), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> maxIndex_sanity (deghost (mgv_deghost net)) -> lastApplied (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) /\ commitIndex (snd (nwState net h)) <= maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))
simulation_1 : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> raft_intermediate_reachable (deghost net)
Record raft_msg_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface { msg_refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost net) } Arguments raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Build_terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface : (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log net) -> (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_nw net) -> terms_and_indices_from_one_log_interface
Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_msg_refinement_interface
Build_raft_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_refinement_interface
Record refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface { entries_contiguous_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net; entries_gt_0_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net; entries_sorted_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> eIndex e > 0 } Arguments refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Record leader_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leader_sublog_interface { leader_sublog_invariant_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leader_sublog_invariant net } Arguments leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_term_sanity_interface { no_entries_past_current_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> no_entries_past_current_term net } Arguments term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
